Name: Presentation of the book "A Revolução da Ilha Pequena"
Description: Presentation of the book "A Revolução da Ilha Pequena" by Livia Borges, presented by Miguel Silva.

Name: Porto Santo Island Open Water Swimming
Description:
The Porto Santo Island Open Water Swimming is a competitive sea swimming event held in Porto Santo, Madeira. It is part of the National Open Water Circuit of the Portuguese Swimming Federation. The event includes the following races:


Saturday, May 24, 2025

1,000 meters: Open to both federated and non-federated swimmers (“popular” category)

2,500 meters: For federated swimmers only


Sunday, May 25, 2025

5,000 meters: For federated swimmers only, this distance is part of the 1st Inter-Association Open Water Tournament


The event aims to promote open water swimming and provide a competitive platform for swimmers of various levels.
Organizer: Associação de Natação da Madeira (ANM), Federação Portuguesa de Natação (FPN), Clube Naval do Porto Santo (CNPS)

Name: XVIII SIMPÓSIO AMBIENTAL
Location: Auditório do CC e de Congressos
Description: The 18th Environmental Symposium with the theme "Uniting Forces for the Island - Sustainability in action". The program includes presentations and discussions over two days.

Name: Concerto do Panda
Description: Concerto do Panda is a family-friendly musical event celebrating Children's Day. It features live performances by beloved children's characters, including Panda, Ruca, Gabby's Dollhouse, and Panda's Band. Attendees can expect music, joy, and surprises designed for the whole family.

Name: 5th Edition of the Tuna Route (5ª Edição da Rota do Atum)
Description: A unique gastronomic festival celebrating the versatility and excellence of tuna. This event features top chefs who create exceptional dishes inspired by Atlantic flavors. It's a culinary journey with 4 special days and the participation of renowned chefs.

Name: JUBILEU NO PORTO SANTO
Description: Event part of "Jubileu 2025 Peregrinos de Esperança". Program includes activities over two days in Porto Santo.
Organizer: Coro do Centro Comunitário de Porto Santo

Name: 17th Meeting of Songs of the Holy Spirit (XVII Encontro de Cantares do Espírito Santo)
Description: This regional cultural and religious event aims to celebrate and preserve the traditions of the Holy Spirit through music and community gathering. It brings together students and educational communities from different regions, fostering cultural exchange, spiritual reflection, and integral development. The event highlights the importance of maintaining and sharing cultural and religious heritage within the community.
Organizer: Escola Básica e Secundária Francisco de Freitas Branco

Name: Sao Joao 2025
Description: The São João Festival in Porto Santo is a vibrant celebration of the island's rich cultural heritage, taking place from June 14 to 24, 2025. As one of the most significant events on the island, it offers a unique blend of traditional and contemporary festivities.

Name: JLL Madeira Padel Tour
Description: This is the fourth stage of the JLL Madeira Padel Tour, a padel tournament taking place in Porto Santo. Registration is still open for those who want to participate and enjoy the sport in a scenic location.
Organizer: Diário de Notícias, Padel Nuestro Madeira

Name: Expo Porto Santo 2025
Description: Expo Porto Santo 2025 is a business and tourism fair that serves as a platform for local and external companies to promote and sell their products. It is a major event for the island of Porto Santo, attracting both tourists and exhibitors, and contributes significantly to the local economy. The fair also encourages tourism by offering an additional attraction during the summer holiday season.
Organizer: Associação de Indústria, Comércio e Turismo do Porto Santo (AICTPS)

Name: Columbus Festival
Description: The Columbus Festival in Porto Santo is a vibrant historical and cultural event that transports visitors back to the 15th century, celebrating the island's connection to Christopher Columbus. Held annually from September 18th to 21st, 2025, in the town of Vila Baleira, the festival offers a rich tapestry of activities that bring the Age of Discoveries to life.

Name: Expo Porto Santo 2025
Description: Expo Porto Santo 2025 is a business and tourism fair that serves as a platform for local and external companies to promote and sell their products. It is a major event for the island of Porto Santo, attracting both tourists and exhibitors, and contributes significantly to the local economy. The fair also encourages tourism by offering an additional attraction during the summer holiday season.
Organizer: Associação de Indústria, Comércio e Turismo do Porto Santo (AICTPS)
